title: Date of the contract
explanation: The contract date is explicitly stated as 'dated as of November 15, 2012'.

title: Party A
explanation: Party A is clearly identified as 'THE BANK OF NOVA SCOTIA ("Party A")'.

title: party_B
explanation: Party B is clearly identified as 'Halifax Funding LLC ("Party B")'.

title: Specified entity Party A
explanation: The text states 'Specified Entity' means in relation to Party A: none.

title: Specified entity Party B
explanation: The text specifies 'in relation to Party B ...: KKR Asset Management LLC (the 'KKR').'

title: Specified transaction scope
explanation: The definition of 'Specified Transaction' follows the standard Section 14 language of the ISDA Master Agreement without modifications, referencing standard types of transactions and confirmations.

title: Cross default applicable parties
explanation: The text states that the 'Cross Default' provisions will apply to Party A and will apply to Party B, indicating both parties are subject to these provisions.

title: Specified indebtness includes borrowed_money
explanation: The text does not mention 'borrowed money' specifically in the definition or exclusion of Specified Indebtedness.

title: Specified indebtness excludes deposits
explanation: The text explicitly states that obligations in respect of deposits are not included in Specified Indebtedness.

title: amount for Party A
explanation: The threshold for Party A is defined as a percentage (3%) of shareholders' equity, not as a fixed amount.

title: currency for Party A
explanation: No specific currency is stated; the threshold is a percentage of shareholders' equity, which could be in any currency.

title: percentage for Party A
explanation: The text states 'an amount equal to 3% of the total shareholders' equity of Party A'.

title: percentage reference for Party A
explanation: The reference is 'shareholders' equity', matching the SHAREHOLDER enum.

title: amount for Party B
explanation: The threshold for Party B is defined as a percentage (3%) of Net Asset Value, not as a fixed amount.

title: currency for Party B
explanation: No specific currency is stated; the threshold is a percentage of Net Asset Value, which could be in any currency.

title: percentage for Party B
explanation: The text states 'an amount equal to 3% of its Net Asset Value'.

title: percentage reference for Party B
explanation: The reference is 'Net Asset Value', matching the NAV enum.

title: Credit Event Upon Merger  applicable parties
explanation: The text states that the 'Credit Event Upon Merger' provisions will apply to both Party A and Party B.

title: Automatic Early Termination  applicable parties
explanation: The provision states that Automatic Early Termination will not apply to either party except in specific bankruptcy/insolvency circumstances, in which case it applies to the affected party. Therefore, both Party A and Party B are potentially subject to Automatic Early Termination under certain conditions.

title: Termination Currency
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Termination Currency' means United States Dollars, which corresponds to the ISO code USD.

title: Email for notices for Party A
explanation: The provided text lists only physical addresses, facsimile, and telephone numbers for Party A, but does not mention any email address for notices.

title: Email for notices for Party B
explanation: The provided text lists only physical addresses, facsimile, and telephone numbers for Party B, but does not mention any email address for notices.

title: Process agent for party A
explanation: The text states 'Party A appoints as its Process Agent: Not applicable.'

title: Name of process agent for party A
explanation: Process agent is not applicable for Party A, so no name is provided.

title: Address of process agent for party A
explanation: Process agent is not applicable for Party A, so no address is provided.

title: Process agent for party B
explanation: The text states 'Party B appoints as its Process Agent: Halifax Funding LLC is: National Registered Agents, Inc., 160 Greentree Drive, Suite 101, Dover, Delaware 19904.'

title: Name of process agent for party B
explanation: The name of the process agent for Party B is explicitly stated.

title: Address of process agent for party B
explanation: The address of the process agent for Party B is explicitly stated.

title: Party A is a Multibranch party
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Party A is a Multibranch Party.'

title: Party A offices
explanation: The text specifies Party A shall be acting out of its New York and Toronto Offices.

title: Party B is a Multibranch party
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Party B is not a Multibranch Party.'

title: Party B offices
explanation: Party B is not a Multibranch Party, so no offices are specified.

title: Party for calculation agent
explanation: The text states 'The Calculation Agent is Party A unless otherwise agreed in a Confirmation in respect to the relevant Transaction.' This indicates Party A is the default calculation agent in business as usual situations.

title: Governing Law
explanation: The text explicitly states that the Agreement will be governed by the laws of the State of New York.
